aboutDesc1: XLab is a platform providing advanced AI-integrated software solutions that help users improve their work efficiency and daily life.
aboutDesc2: Our mission is to provide Vietnamese people with access to tools for work, study, and entertainment at affordable prices and international quality.
faqDesc: Answers to common customer questions about XLab products and services
faq1Desc: You can download free software on the corresponding product page after logging into your account. For paid products, you need to complete payment before downloading.
faq2Title: How do I activate my license?
faq2Desc: After purchasing a product, you will receive an activation code via email. Open the application, go to the "Activate License" section and enter this code to use the full features.
faq3Title: How many devices can I use?
faq3Desc: Each license allows you to use up to 3 different devices. If you want to use more devices, please purchase additional licenses or upgrade to the enterprise package.
faq4Desc: We have a 7-day refund policy from the date of purchase if the product does not meet your needs. Please contact our support team for guidance.
faq5Title: How do I contact technical support?
faq5Desc: You can contact our technical support team via email at support@xlab.vn, hotline 1900.xxxx, or live chat on our website. We respond within 24 business hours.
faq6Title: Does XLab provide solutions for businesses?
faq6Desc: Yes, we have special service packages for businesses with price incentives and specialized technical support. Please contact us for the most suitable solution.
ctaTitle: Ready to boost your work efficiency with XLab?
ctaDesc: We offer special discounted prices for customers who buy in bulk. The more you buy, the higher the discount. We are committed to providing you with the best solutions at the most reasonable cost.
